sent.orig: In the afternoon, do your homework as carefully asAnd try to learn more after your homework.
sent.trans: 下午了，仔细地完成家庭作业。完成之后，去学更多有关英语的知识。

sent.orig: Homework: Homework in this course will involve both written work and oral presentations.
sent.trans: 作业：在这门课程中涉及到写作和口语作业。

sent.orig: Dad: It's homework time now. Go and do your homework and then go to bed.
sent.trans: 爸爸：现在是家庭作业时间。去做作业，然后上床睡觉。

sent.orig: Homework?Young person reports doing at least one hour of homework every school day.
sent.trans: 家庭作业——青少年上学时间每天至少做一个小时的家庭作业。

sent.orig: It is too difficult for me to do homework and we have much (homework) .
sent.trans: 对我来说做作业很难而且我们有太多的作业。
